Html:
I'm using http://localhost/KiGG and I have Anonymous Access turned on but I keep getting a You are not authorized to view this page error

 

Any help would be appreciated.
This issue is related to IIS I guess. if you are using IIS 7.0 make sure that your app pool is running on integrated mode and not classic. This is how It is configured on my local machine.

unfortunately I'm running on xp with iis 5.0. will that even work? or can it work within the VS built in webserver?
